OOC: are 150 shots allowed from one gun?

:::Bluestreak/Andromeda/Ratchet/Sidesiwpe:::

::Bluestreak dodges Ignatius' shots and sees Bullet attacking Andromeda::
Bluestreak: Nooooo!
::He throws himself in front of Andromeda, taking the shots for her.  He 
blocks some but a few hit him.  He didnt care.  Andromeda was not going to 
die::
Andromeda: Thanks.
Bluestreak: Any time love.
::Andromeda shoots 1 missle at Ignatius and 1 at Bullet.  Meanwhile, Ratchet 
transforms to beast mode and shoots his ear blasters up at Hammer.  Sideswipe 
runs out to the fight::
Sideswipe: Yes! now i can test out this new body!
::he transforms to vehicle mode and shoots 2 missles out of his missle 
launcher at Prebon::
